overview: Roberto has over 14 years experience working in software development in both technical and management roles. As the principal software architect, Roberto oversees the development and management of the Blogging Sparks websites, network server infrastructure back-end. Prior to Blogging Sparks Network, Roberto led the development of an online benchmark assessment system for the State of Florida, served as VP Product Development for a software company utilizing Voice Recognition technology, worked closely with investors and an investment banking firm to raise capital to co-found 2 other software companies. Roberto is also an internationally known illustrator and artist, having his artwork featured on book, magazine and comic book covers.
